posts.message: My 3rd video: How to draw/create arrows by using only Cross Browser CSS
posts.description: This video shows how to draw arrows in pure CSS, in a way that works with all browsers all the way to IE6. It also gives some bonus to those who support IE8+...

UI Designer/Developer needed for a start up in El-Tagamo3 el 5ames.
